alert.note: Alert for East Puget Sound Lowlands; Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior; Tacoma Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 6:03AM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow continued. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Tacoma and vicinity, including Vaughn, Gig Harbor, Fox Island, Anderson Island, DuPont, Puyallup, and Spanaway, East Puget Sound Lowlands from Snohomish County to Pierce County, including Arlington, Gold Bar, Duvall, Snoqualmie, Buckley, and Eatonville, Far southwest Mason County and the interior lowlands of Grays Harbor County, including Matlock, McCleary, and Montesano and Lowlands of Thurston, western Lewis, and far southeast Mason Counties, including Harstine Island, Olympia, Centralia, and Toledo. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Puget Sound Lowlands; Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior; Tacoma Area
